loginFailed.title: Login Failed
loginFailed.description: We couldn't complete the sign-in process. Please try again later.
loginFailed.description-authenticated: We couldn't finish the process of linking to an external account. Please try again later.

loginInProgress.title: Signing you in...
loginInProgress.description: Please wait while we complete the process.

logoutPage.title: Signing you out...
logoutPage.description: Please wait while we complete the process.

password.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.maxLength: Password cannot be longer than 32 characters
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number

username.minLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
username.maxLength: Username cannot be longer than 50 characters

login.email_already_in_use: The email is already used for another account
login.handle_already_in_use: The username is already used for another account
login.username_or_password_incorrect: The email and password do not match.

error.invalid_request: Something went wrong while submitting your request. Please try again.
error.internal_server_error: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again later.
error.invalid_token: Your access has expired or is invalid. Please log in again.
error.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
